posts.post_content:
Have a lot of 5 HOF's for sale. See scan for details

1)Rube Marquard PIEDMONT back. Has a hole. Small crease. Red ghost image on front.
2)Vic Willis, portrait. SWEET CAPORAL. Seems a little short vertically. Crease
3)Jennings, one hand. POLAR BEAR back. Pencil/paper loss on back. Creases.
4)Joss, pitching. SWEET CAPORAL back. Creases.
5)Crawford. SWEET CAPORAL. Clean back. Few creases.

One lot:$195

Money order or personal check only

Email to [url]cherlast@yahool.com[/url]
